Amelia Estrich
Publicity Associate

814 N Franklin St
Chicago, IL 60610

Google staff “NOTE”

This below thief is emotionally disturbed she sets up multiple bulk  
accounts each and all the exact same and rants and raves about the  
injustice of the law persistently repeatedly while breaking the law, in  
abusing licensed copyright material without payment or consent and also  
using blogspot accounts to threaten my life. As it is I am already dying  
and considering she is using your services to do this and she is  
persistently ignoring the law you will have her arrested and banned  
lifelong from using your services again

Mark my words I demand that the FBI as Google director stand in a court of  
law for allowing this woman’s sick mind to weave its tangled web and  
threaten my life week after week while Google staff clearly as sick and  
disturbed as the woman allow this to persist never ending

I want several million in compensation for this and Google staff imprisoned  
alongside this sick twisted woman

YOU WILL NOT IGNORE THIS AGAIN YOU WILL HAVE POLICE ARREST HER TODAY


IF THIS THIEF BELOW DOES NOT WISH TO FACE A LONG TIME IN PRISON SHE WILL  
IMMEDIATELY CEASE UNLICENSED USE OF MY POEMS THIS IS THREE TIMES SHE HAS  
DEFRAUDED MYSELF AND THE USA COPYRIGHT AND THREATENED MY LIFE YOU WILL  
ENSURE SHE STOPS BREAKING THE LAW TO SHOUT AND BALL ABOUT THE LAW

This is the third time you have not only allowed the exact same poem to be  
used in bulk without license, but it is the third time you HAVE  
DELIBERATELY ALLOWED THIS THIEF TO THREATEN MY LIFE ONLINE as it is I am  
dying and I NOW DEMAND YOU WRITE TO THIS THIEF AND TELL HER DIRECTLY SHE IS  
GOING TO NOW COST GOOGLE BILLIONS IN Lawful action and that she will indeed  
face imprisonment if two years for every case and charges of attempted  
murder too

YOU WILL DELETE HER ENTIRE ACCOUNT THIS TIME AND I AIM TO HAVE POLICE  
ARRESTING GOOGLE DIRECTOR AS ALSO THIS PERSISTENT REPEAT THIEF


REPEAT MULTIPLE BULK Complaints Piracy Notice of Copyright


CONSIDERING THIS THIEF IS SCREAMING ABOUT THE LAW THEN WHY IS SHE FOR THE  
THIRD TIME AROUND BREAKING AND DELIBERATELY ABUSING THE LAW

This very clearly shows and reflects the very real need for Google to cease  
ILLEGAL CRIMINAL POSTING OF ALL MATERIAL AT CHILLINGEFFECTS.ORG

Mark my words in the legal case Google are about to face your ignorant  
staff have just now dug Google’s own grave

This time you will delete every one of the accounts this determined thief  
has created and mark my words I will be compensated by Google for the time  
their staff have allowed this thief to steal from me not just once but  
twice over


"It is illegal globally punishable by imprisonment for any global  
individual to report any legal copyright notice as spam"

Attn: Legal Support, DMCA Complaints Piracy Notice of Copyright


Note* Consent is not strictly granted without a paid for licence of  
£100,000 weekly for any of the material listed below also any part this  
entire dmca or the poem at chillingeffects .org or any other web site in  
the globe. There is no point in having the material removed for other  
people to simply breach the copyright laws by placing this on their site.  
We will sue to this full if this legal notice is not met in full

Signed copy is attached, please there for ensure this matter is dealt with  
swiftly


Mr C R Slater
49A City Road
Newcastle upon Tyne
NE12AQ England
07871430052
poetchristopehrrobin@gmail.com

Sir, Madam,

Unlicensed illegal pirate use and display of registered copyright material  
without paid license fees of one hundred thousand UK pounds weekly  
registered  with United Nations UK USA European Copyright Law Registration  
Numbers TXu 1-598-108 TXu 1-598-102 and 295451 detected by Plagiarism  
Detector www.plagiarism-detector.com

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described  
below as allegedly infringing is not authorised by myself as copyright  
owner, or the law."

"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the  
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive  
right that is allegedly infringed."

The material is currently illegally clearly displayed on your servers  
without my requested or given author/owner consent. It must be removed as  
in line with copyright law and host master Terms of Service United Nations  
Europe UK and USA 2006/2007

If signed copy of this notice is required by your company I will email one  
today via PDF attachment (identical as fax) for you to view/print.

/Christopher R Slater/
Christopher R Slater

*NOTE the thief had clearly ignored anti theft protection as legal
